comment: It has been a landslide in the one direction. I hope the Oscars are good tomorrow. I love that Warren Beatty and Faye Dunaway will be back as well. They didn't deserve that mess up last year. Not their fault.

      :snt1 (l / landslide

                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Oscars"))
                  :time (t / tomorrow)))
      :snt3 (l2 / love-01

                  :ARG1 (a / and
                        :op1 (p / person
                              :name (n2 / name

                                    :op2 "Beatty"))
                        :op2 (p2 / person

                  :mod (a2 / as-well)))
      :snt4 (d / deserve-01

                  :mod (t3 / that))

comment: I love Laurie Metcalf. She's from Chicago and performed at Steppenwolf often. I like both her and Allison Janney but the "I'Tonya" role is more flashy. Both women are terrific though. By the way I think "The Shape Of Water " will win Best Picture.

      :snt1 (l / love-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
